items.title: Kevin Durant Regains Coinbase Access; 2016 Bitcoin Stake Soars
items.excerpt: Coinbase confirmed on X that Kevin Durant has regained access to his account, a development that coincides with a substantial appreciation in a Bitcoin position he first purchased in 2016. The stake, originally bought at an estimated $650 per Bitcoin, is now valued near $116,000 and is up over 17,700% (CoinMarketCap).
